name: Nyron Kube
description:
A very humble cyberpunk game.

Just run away from the seagulls (they don't do anything at all on you, anyway! :D )

Developed with Ricardo Santos, Luis Silva and Ana Araújo.

-------

some assets used:

- music from Inavision - Cyberpunk Scifi Futuristic -  https://freesound.org/people/Inavision/sounds/479258/  

- typefaces Belgika ( http://osp.kitchen/foundry/belgica-belgika/ ) and Lcd30bit ( http://nitrofurano.altervista.org/typefaces/lcd30bit/ )

- some sounds from https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K3AL1QguGbE and  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3E1IGYQ0NNI

- some textures based on https://www.behance.net/gallery/16347111/Generative-2008-2013
